entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then north 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
